title: Catan
description: A strategy and trading game where players colonize an island, build roads and cities, and trade resources.

title: Monopoly
description: A classic board game where players buy, sell, and trade properties to get rich.

title: Ticket to Ride
description: A game where players collect train cards to complete railway routes across North America.

title: Pandemic
description: A cooperative game where players work together to stop the spread of global diseases.

title: Carcassonne
description: A tile-placement game where players build cities, roads, and fields in southern France.

title: Risk
description: A global conquest game where players fight to control the world through diplomacy and warfare.

title: Dixit
description: A storytelling game where players use their imagination to tell stories and guess each other's cards.

title: Scrabble
description: A word game where players form words on a board using letter tiles to score points.

title: Uno
description: A card game where players try to get rid of all their cards by matching colors and numbers.

title: 7 Wonders
description: A civilization-building game where players develop their empires over three ages.

title: Terraforming Mars
description: A strategy game where players compete to transform Mars into a habitable planet through terraforming projects.

title: Azul
description: A tile-placement game where players decorate the walls of the Royal Palace of Evora in Portugal.

title: Codenames
description: A word and deduction game where players must find the code names of their agents before the rival team.

title: Agricola
description: A strategy game where players manage a farm, growing crops, raising animals, and improving their home.

title: Ticket to Ride: Europe
description: A version of the Ticket to Ride game set in Europe, with new rules and challenges.

title: Puerto Rico
description: A game of building and management where players develop the island of Puerto Rico through agriculture and trade.

title: King of Tokyo
description: A monster battle game where players fight for control of the city of Tokyo using dice and cards.

title: Splendor
description: A game of chip-collecting and card-building where players aim to become the richest merchants of the Renaissance.

title: Caverna: The Cave Farmers
description: A farm management game where players raise animals, grow crops, and dig into the mountain to find resources.

title: Mysterium
description: A cooperative deduction game where players work together to solve a murder mystery using clues provided by a spirit.
